casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Dwayne Demont HAIZLIP No. 329P14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 19, 2016 James D. Concepcion, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Dwayne Demont Haizlip, for Haizlip, Dwayne Demont.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 19th of September 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of September 2016."

Ervin, J. recused

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of September 2016 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of September 2016."

Ervin, J. recused

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of September 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of September 2016."

Ervin, J. recused
